verses.verse: ( Passover and the Feast of Unleavened Bread) ( 20 12:14-28 ;  30 23:4-8 ;  40 28:16-25 ) שָׁמוֹר֙ <WH8104> šā·mō·wr Observe אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> ḥō·ḏeš the month הָאָבִ֔יב <WH24> hā·’ā·ḇîḇ of Abib ( Abib was the first month of the ancient Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of March and April; twice in this verse.) וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> wə·‘ā·śî·ṯā and celebrate פֶּ֔סַח <WH6453> pe·saḥ the Passover לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God, כִּ֞י <WH3588> kî because בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> bə·ḥō·ḏeš in the month הָֽאָבִ֗יב <WH24> hā·’ā·ḇîḇ of Abib הוֹצִ֨יאֲךָ֜ <WH3318> hō·w·ṣî·’ă·ḵā brought you out יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mim·miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> lā·yə·lāh by night.

וְזָבַ֥חְתָּ <WH2076> wə·zā·ḇaḥ·tā You are to offer פֶּ֛סַח <WH6453> pe·saḥ the Passover sacrifice לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God צֹ֣אן <WH6629> ṣōn or flock וּבָקָ֑ר <WH1241> ū·ḇā·qār from the herd בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> bam·mā·qō·wm in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - יִבְחַ֣ר <WH977> yiḇ·ḥar will choose יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <WH7931> lə·šak·kên as a dwelling שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> šə·mōw for His Name שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> šām ....

לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- You must not תֹאכַ֤ל <WH398> ṯō·ḵal eat עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw with it; חָמֵ֔ץ <WH2557> ḥā·mêṣ leavened bread שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> šiḇ·‘aṯ for seven יָמִ֛ים <WH3117> yā·mîm days תֹּֽאכַל־ <WH398> tō·ḵal- you are to eat עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw with it מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> maṣ·ṣō·wṯ unleavened bread, לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> le·ḥem the bread עֹ֑נִי <WH6040> ‘ō·nî of affliction, כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî because בְחִפָּז֗וֹן <WH2649> ḇə·ḥip·pā·zō·wn in haste — יָצָ֙אתָ֙ <WH3318> yā·ṣā·ṯā you left מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> mê·’e·reṣ the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> lə·ma·‘an so that תִּזְכֹּר֔ <WH2142> tiz·kōr you may remember אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - י֤וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm - צֵֽאתְךָ֙ <WH3318> ṣê·ṯə·ḵā you left מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> mê·’e·reṣ the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt. כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kōl for the rest יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> yə·mê the day חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> ḥay·ye·ḵā of your life

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- No יֵרָאֶ֨ה <WH7200> yê·rā·’eh is to be found לְךָ֥ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) שְׂאֹ֛ר 7603 N-ms ( śə·’ōr) leaven בְּכָל־ 3605 Prep-b│N-msc ( bə·ḵāl) in all גְּבֻלְךָ֖ 1366 N-msc│2ms ( gə·ḇul·ḵā) your land שִׁבְעַ֣ת 7651 Number-msc ( šiḇ·‘aṯ) for seven יָמִ֑ים 3117 N-mp ( yā·mîm) days, וְלֹא־ 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō-) and none יָלִ֣ין 3885 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yā·lîn) shall remain מִן־ 4480 Prep ( min-) of הַבָּשָׂ֗ר 1320 Art│N-ms ( hab·bā·śār) the meat אֲשֶׁ֨ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) - תִּזְבַּ֥ח 2076 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( tiz·baḥ) you sacrifice בָּעֶ֛רֶב 6153 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( bā·‘e·reḇ) in the evening בַּיּ֥וֹם 3117 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( bay·yō·wm) day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן 7223 Art│Adj-ms ( hā·ri·šō·wn) of the first לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ 1242 Prep-l, Art│N-ms ( lab·bō·qer) until morning.

לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō You are not תוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> ṯū·ḵal ... לִזְבֹּ֣חַ <WH2076> liz·bō·aḥ to sacrifice אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַפָּ֑סַח <WH6453> hap·pā·saḥ the Passover animal בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> bə·’a·ḥaḏ in any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> šə·‘ā·re·ḵā of the towns אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> nō·ṯên is giving לָֽךְ׃ Prep│2ms ( lāḵ) you.

כִּ֠י <WH3588> kî You must only אִֽם־ <WH518> ’im- ... אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- at הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - יִבְחַ֨ר <WH977> yiḇ·ḥar will choose יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God לְשַׁכֵּ֣ן <WH7931> lə·šak·kên as a dwelling שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> šə·mōw for His Name שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> šām .... תִּזְבַּ֥ח <WH2076> tiz·baḥ offer אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַפֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> hap·pe·saḥ the Passover sacrifice בָּעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> bā·‘ā·reḇ Do this in the evening כְּב֣וֹא <WH935> kə·ḇō·w sets, הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> haš·še·meš as the sun מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> mō·w·‘êḏ at the same time צֵֽאתְךָ֥ <WH3318> ṣê·ṯə·ḵā you departed מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mim·miṣ·rā·yim from Egypt.

וּבִשַּׁלְתָּ֙ <WH1310> ū·ḇiš·šal·tā And you shall roast it וְאָ֣כַלְתָּ֔ <WH398> wə·’ā·ḵal·tā and eat it בַּמָּק֕וֹם <WH4725> bam·mā·qō·wm in the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> yiḇ·ḥar will choose, יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God בּ֑וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) וּפָנִ֣יתָ 6437 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-2ms ( ū·p̄ā·nî·ṯā) - בַבֹּ֔קֶר 1242 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( ḇab·bō·qer) and in the morning וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ 1980 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-2ms ( wə·hā·laḵ·tā) you shall return לְאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ 168 Prep-l│N-mpc│2ms ( lə·’ō·hā·le·ḵā) to your tents.

שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> šê·šeṯ For six יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> yā·mîm days תֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> tō·ḵal you must eat מַצּ֑וֹת <WH4682> maṣ·ṣō·wṯ unleavened bread, וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> ū·ḇay·yō·wm day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> haš·šə·ḇî·‘î and on the seventh עֲצֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH6116> ‘ă·ṣe·reṯ you shall hold a solemn assembly לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God, לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō and you must not תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ṯa·‘ă·śeh do מְלָאכָֽה׃ס <WH4399> mə·lā·ḵāh any work.

שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> šiḇ·‘āh seven שָׁבֻעֹ֖ת <WH7620> šā·ḇu·‘ōṯ weeks ( The Feast of Weeks) ( 40 28:26-31) תִּסְפָּר־ 5608 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( tis·pār-) You are to count off לָ֑ךְ Prep│2ms ( lāḵ) מֵהָחֵ֤ל 2490 Prep-m│V-Hifil-Inf ( mê·hā·ḥêl) ... חֶרְמֵשׁ֙ 2770 N-ms ( ḥer·mêš) you first put the sickle בַּקָּמָ֔ה 7054 Prep-b, Art│N-fs ( baq·qā·māh) to the standing grain תָּחֵ֣ל 2490 V-Hifil-Imperf-2ms ( tā·ḥêl) .... לִסְפֹּ֔ר 5608 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lis·pōr) [from] שִׁבְעָ֖ה 7651 Number-ms ( šiḇ·‘āh) ... שָׁבֻעֽוֹת׃ 7620 N-mp ( šā·ḇu·‘ō·wṯ) [the time]

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> wə·‘ā·śî·ṯā And you shall celebrate חַ֤ג <WH2282> ḥaḡ the Feast שָׁבֻעוֹת֙ <WH7620> šā·ḇu·‘ō·wṯ of Weeks ( That is, Shavuot; see footnotes for verse 16.) לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God מִסַּ֛ת <WH4530> mis·saṯ ... נִדְבַ֥ת <WH5071> niḏ·ḇaṯ with a freewill offering יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> yā·ḏə·ḵā ... אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that תִּתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> tit·tên you give כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka·’ă·šer in proportion to how יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <WH1288> yə·ḇā·reḵ·ḵā has blessed you, יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֞ <WH8055> wə·śā·maḥ·tā and you shall rejoice לִפְנֵ֣י׀ <WH6440> lip̄·nê before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> ’at·tāh you, וּבִנְךָ֣ <WH1121> ū·ḇin·ḵā your sons וּבִתֶּךָ֮ <WH1323> ū·ḇit·te·ḵā and daughters, וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> wə·‘aḇ·də·ḵā your menservants וַאֲמָתֶךָ֒ <WH519> wa·’ă·mā·ṯe·ḵā and maidservants, וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <WH3881> wə·hal·lê·wî and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> biš·‘ā·re·ḵā within your gates, וְהַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> wə·hag·gêr as well as the foreigner, וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <WH3490> wə·hay·yā·ṯō·wm the fatherless, וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> wə·hā·’al·mā·nāh and the widows אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> bə·qir·be·ḵā among you. בַּמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> bam·mā·qō·wm in the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - יִבְחַר֙ <WH977> yiḇ·ḥar will choose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh He אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā ... לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <WH7931> lə·šak·kên as a dwelling שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> šə·mōw for His Name שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> šām ... —

וְזָ֣כַרְתָּ֔ <WH2142> wə·zā·ḵar·tā Remember כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- that עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> ‘e·ḇeḏ slaves הָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> hā·yî·ṯā you were בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> bə·miṣ·rā·yim in Egypt, וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <WH8104> wə·šā·mar·tā and carefully וְעָשִׂ֔יתָ <WH6213> wə·‘ā·śî·ṯā follow אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַֽחֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> ha·ḥuq·qîm statutes. הָאֵֽלֶּה׃פ <WH428> hā·’êl·leh these

חַ֧ג <WH2282> ḥaḡ the Feast הַסֻּכֹּ֛ת <WH5521> has·suk·kōṯ of Tabernacles ( Or Booths or Shelters; see footnotes for verse 16.) ( The Feast of Tabernacles) ( 40 29:12-40) תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה 6213 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( ta·‘ă·śeh) You are to celebrate לְךָ֖ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) שִׁבְעַ֣ת 7651 Number-msc ( šiḇ·‘aṯ) for seven יָמִ֑ים 3117 N-mp ( yā·mîm) days בְּאָ֨סְפְּךָ֔ 622 Prep-b│V-Qal-Inf│2ms ( bə·’ā·sə·pə·ḵā) after you have gathered מִֽגָּרְנְךָ֖ 1637 Prep-m│N-fsc│2ms ( mig·gā·rə·nə·ḵā) [the produce of] your threshing floor וּמִיִּקְבֶֽךָ׃ 3342 Conj-w, Prep-m│N-msc│2ms ( ū·mî·yiq·ḇe·ḵā) and your winepress.
